name: .RCTD File Extension
summary: Learn about .RCTD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Dataset used by RabbitCTRunner, an open platform for benchmarking 3D cone-beam reconstruction algorithms; contains a preprocessed C-arm CT collection of data from a rabbit; accessed by RabbitCTRunner, which performs the benchmark and evaluation of the data.

content: RabbitCTRunner uses the RCTD file to reconstruct the benchmark. This process consists of three steps:
Download RabbitCTRunner and the RCTD Dataset from the website (the link is located below under the Windows, Mac, and Linux programs).
Download a precompiled back projection module, e.g., LolaBunny, or implement your own backprojection module.
Execute RabbitCTRunner from the command line. This will produce a volume file and an encoded result file that can be uploaded to the RabbitCT servers.
NOTE: The RCTD file can be downloaded from the same page that the RabbitCTRunner application is downloaded from.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
